content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from berwick on rt 93 south it is a rural road. it was a clear day with bright blue skies, about 55 degrees outside. i was looking at a plane in the sky and was wondering if it was laying a chemtrail or a contrail. the plane was very distant, i could make out the plane but no color and could not see details on the plane. as i was watching, at the same height as the plane but much closer to me, a sphere simply materialized. it was the color of mercury that we got out of old fashioned thermometers. what amazed me was that as it materialized it had a white aura around it that quickly dissapated. no noise that i could hear, but it was far away and my window was closed. i would approximate it to about 15 miles away from me. 

as i watched stunned it seemed to roll from the bottom to the top or quiver with ripples rolling form the bottom to top. sort of like ripples in the water of a pond. the ripples went from side to side and then upwards. the center of the sphere seemed darker. there was a glare from the sun coming off of it but not a blinding glare. just enough of a glare to know it was metallic like. as it did that the shpere sort of seemed to pull on itself and slightly pushed into a flatter bottom so that it was almost to an oval shape. then it was gone, simply vansished there was no fading out or anything it was just gone. 

in my head my first thought was 'that was a mistake' a mistake by the sphere not by me. it was an odd feeling. i was very calm though. my second thought is that the nuclear power plant behind me is down for repairs. my third thought was wow that was so fast i bet no one else saw it. 

there was no time to get a picture and if i had not been right there looking up at the time i would not have seen it. this was my first daytime sighting of anything unusual.
content.summary: Sphere materialized looked like a huge ball of mercury. vanished after rolling over.

content.detailedDescription: This is our third time seeing this event so i decided to report it. she has seen this event twice at night around 8 to 9 pm az time in the eastern sky and in the southern sky of lake havasu city. i have seen the object once and after discussing it we've agreed it is the same type of event. i have never seen anything even close to this and i have seen some very interesting things in our desert sky. the event lasts 2 seconds or less. it is a very bright blue (believe it or not) thumbnail shaped object traveling approx. 2800 to 3200 miles per hour and is visible by an all encompassing glow over the surface of the object. this does not compare to a meteorite. there is no trail visible and the object maintains its shape even though it is only seen briefly. we say thumbnail because it has a curved front end, flat sides and a blunt but semi-curved backend. we seem to see it straight-on from the ground to the bottom each time. we can't tell elevation or size but i would guess it to be 100+ feet across and nearly equal in length with no visible wings or extremities.
content.summary: Thumbnail shaped, bright blue ufo streaks across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
There is a ufo in one of these pictures, i have over 70 photos taken from a nasa land surveyor on mars. these 70 frames are taken from one source-linked photo.

but beyond structured crafts, we are trying to prove existance of other human like life forms. once we jump here, ufo's, (advanced structured craft,) become a no brainer.

i have proven it by using one of nasa's photo,...As it was high definition. sure, there were tamperings and censoring observed under high zooms,...But there was so much there they missed a ton of incredible life forms they couldn't get all of the evidenced pixel, coverd, or distorted.

it would be safe to assume that if you could find one humanoid on mars photo you would be able to find two,....And once you find two, it is probable you would find three, if you can find three there is no decrease in probability of finding four, five, six, seven humanoids in a photo that is suppose to be of mars.

in this photo you will see proof of an existance of advanced civilization that has congregated around a crater and lake bed.

naturally subterranian water is the last place to give up its water. ground water is almost a certainty if there is ice on top soil or even scant meltings and dried up lake beds.

why not underneath an ancient lake can you not find millions of gallons of water.

anyway there is a disk in an early photo you can see it on the negative and the base frame, however, what is more important i have compiled the greatest group of pictures that demonstrate a vibrant, active, integrated civilization, clinging to existance in a hostile environment.

these photos are just fantastic, just simply fantastic.  you all will have a great time looking over these figures, statues, tools, machinery, sculptures, and carvings. i need to confirm who is receiving the collection of pictures,...I need a name,...In the meantime, 
here are a few samples!

(i will need a personal email to send these to.)

these actual photos were enhanced with great time expendatures,...They enhancements are protected under copywrites as my enhancements, but you can go to main nasa source photo and find the figures yourself and publish those frames all you want.

bret lowell peirce
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Insignia,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Other
content.summary: Story of the milenium,....Advanced life on mars, i still don't believe it myself!

content.detailedDescription:
On the weekend of march 8-9, 1997, i was camping with a group of students next to fish creek, az.

sometime between 11pm and 1 am on the night of march 8-9, 1997, i woke up to use the rest room.  as i stood next to my tent, i was facing north and enjoying the starlit sky for a moment before i went back to sleep.  then, i noticed a light moving steadily from my left to right [west to east] above the rim of the canyon i was in.

the light appeared to be a globe or orb glowing continuously.  because of the size of the light and its relative speed, i first thought it was a light civil aircraft.  as i watched, i could see no aircraft outline, nor any other running lights (e.G. wingtip strobes, red or green running lights).  all i could see was a globe that was the color of an incandescent lightbulb.  i judged it to be too large for a typical light civil running light.  i did not hear any sounds that an aircraft or helicopter would make.

based on the size of the globe, its brightness, and angle above the horizon [maybe 20 degrees - a guess because i have not been to fish creek for six or seven years], i ruled out a sattelite.  i spent 12 years in the marine anti-aircraft warfare field and spend many nights in the desert observing aircraft, and many hours watching radar scopes, and have watched sattelites go overhead.

as i watched, the light disappeared behind a rock formation that jutted up from the canyon wall.  i waited for the light to appear on the other side of the rock formation.  i waited a minute or more.  it never reappeared.

while i observed it, it never changed speed or direction.  i don't think it was an aircraft landing light because i don't think it would have been that bright from my angle which was appeared to be perpendicular to its line of flight.  i don't know what it was.

i can't compare it to the phoenix light observed five days later because i did not observe the phoenix lights.  recent interest over the march 13th anniversary of the phoenix lights prompted me to make this report.

Walking the dog, i look up to the skies as i use to do from time to time.
by chance, i discover a dark shape moving in the sky. 
no lights, almost tenuous. i thought: what a large bird.
i kept on watching to see if i could tell which kind of bird it was, as huge birds are not usual around here. 
but almost instantaneously i thought, that is not a bird, must be a delta wing? no sound, no lights...
then i started to see it more clearly its shape against the stars. that is not a delta wing either. it was crossing the sky just too fast, and it seemed huge and very high. besides it was doing such a perfect straight line.
all along the watching, but  specially when it was at the closest position over me, i noticed that there was some sort of ���cloud��� that seemed to emanate from the solid shape itself, but it was not leaving a trail, it was like vapour all around the structure.
in a night with no clouds, one single strange pentagonal cloud was crossing the sky at a speed too high for being a cloud (besides there was no wind either), and indeed, it was not a cloud, a solid shape was perfectly distinguishable.
i followed its movement with the eyes, and eventually blocking the street lights with my hand as it was farther and harder to see, until eventually it disappeared in the distance. not yet a dot as apparent size, but not able to tell anymore where it was with the naked eye.

extended information:

-location: center of the city of madrid, spain.
-very clear night full of stars. sky was not yet dark, but rather deep blue.
-the object crossed the sky from south east to north west.
-the object seemed to pass at a very high altitude.
-the object was dark grey and dull, almost absorbing light.
-the object was hard to discern, but it was occluding the stars.
-the object had a solid pentagonal shape, that seemed surrounded all around by a dark grey fog, as some sort of cloaking.
-the object had an apparent size of a full moon.
-the object speed was too fast for being a balloon, or a real delta wing. 
in fact, too fast for being a jet plane. it crossed the full sky in around 10 seconds.
content.summary: Cloaked pentagonal delta wing shape crossing the skies from se to nw at high speed and altitude over madrid city.  no lights, no sounds.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was travelling from nne in a ssw direction. from where my house is located in ajax the object was travelling towards lake ontario/the pickering nuclear plant/city of toronto. all three would have laid in it's path. there were two lights, very dim but more than enough to keep the object sighted. it's difficult to describe the size, my best guess would be approximately the size of a medium fixed wing aircraft, like a lear jet possibly. it was completely silent, and the two lights appeared to be offset for the direction it was travelling. i've seen birds at night time, but this was different. it was travelling so fast and straight and it looked to be a void in the middle, neither black or light gray like the sky, but just an empty space in the middle of these two fixed points. the sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds or less before it passed to the other side of my house.

1. i just arrived home from work where i drive a city bus.

2. i often look up in the sky on clear nights while i have a smoke before going indoors, i see quite a few "shooting stars" on nights like this, including the odd satellite passing over.

3. a jet, but even after it had passed over i heard no sound from it.

4. it flew straight and level, as though it was gliding...But very quick!

5. i was stunned and left asking what the hell was that?! i feld odd afterwards, like i couldn't explain what it was. then i started thinking it must have been birds, two white birds - but again the object was quicker than any birds i've ever seen day or night. i also have never seen birds quite that well lit up like these two tips were. birds will also move diffently that what these two lights were doing.

6. the object passed over my house and it was moving to fast for me to get to the other side. it would have been long gone.
content.summary: An object passed over my house at a high rate of speed, completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on scenic hwy, saw 3 fireball (glowing mostly orange slight redish when faded out)in a row about eyeball level over the water of escambia bay off in the distance. closely resembled flares, however, they did not move, only faded in and out very slowly a couple times. was a bit cloudy out, but these shapes appeared below cloud level. these were very distinct from other airplanes and aircraft seen, they did not move. slightly windy conditions, 55 degrees, visibility was good.
content.summary: 3 fireball shapes in a row, fading in and out over escambia bay

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving up route one going north. we stopped on the side of the road and looked over the ocean.  we saw a little light just dancing about over the sea. it was hard to gauge it's distance, but my unscientific guess would be 10 miles out.

the light just bounced around. it moved around a lot, but didn't go anywhere. up, down, left right, etc. we watched it for about five minutes and we left before the light was extinguished. 

i'm not sure what made us first notice the object. i think we stopped to pee or something. and we were looking over the dark ocean and noticed it.

my feelings:
i was a little unsure of what it was. living in california, i tend to see army stuff often: rockets, jet fighters, etc. i didn't think it was that though. i didn't think it was a plane. i was completely dumbfounded and was content with not ever knowing.

i didn't lose sight of it, i just left.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An interesting light far out at sea moving in odd patterns and going nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 8:04pm i walked out to my back porch and i looked up as i always do. i was facing kind of southwest. from the corner of my eye in the east i noticed about 8 or 9 slightly lit, or dimmly reflective objects in the air. they were headed sw. in a split second i went from thinking they were birds to realizing the time of the day, their formation and the light. 
it took me a second or so to focus my eyes on them because they were not really bright, about as dim as a distant star and they were sort of blurry, i guess saying they were round with an aura is the best description. if it wasn't for them moving i would not have noticed them. they were all flying close together, not in any particular shape and they were moving around within their "formation" and appeared to all be and stay at the same exact altitude as it sped through the sky. they flw straight in one direction. the best way to describe the individual objects would be that they were round, disc shaped, blue-ish / grey center and aura. no sound at all. totally silent. i lost sight of them because of the distance and visibility. it was partly cloudy. about 10 seconds afterwards  i received a phone call from my brother and told him about it. i went back out the next night at around the same time and have not seen them since. this was on wed, march 10.
content.summary: Seen small flying mass (about 9 objects),thought it was birds but didn't notice flapping.Wings. they were either lit or reflecting light.

content.detailedDescription:
Like the erie pa sightings these sightings over chicago have been occurring for some time now. i watch the night sky as much as i can. when i see these strange lights in the past i usually first observe red orbs changing to orange orbs then these intelligently controlled orbs of light noiselessly fly into various formations such as triangles stay stationary for minutes then dim out and shoot straight up into the sky. also i have been noticing quite a few fake aircraft. i say fake b/c the lighting configuration and the lights themselves look like nothing i have ever seen before. i have spent the past 18 years in the aviation business and have never seen anything like what i have been seeing in the sky for the past year. attached is photo i took of orange orbs. they were in a triangle when i took the photo. only one came out well enough to see. no they were not chinese lanterns. they maneuvered in a intelligently controlled manner. i believe that its only a matter of time before who ever is piloting them make contact with earth. after researching to see if anyone else has seen the same thing it amazes me how many people around the world via youtube have caught the same exact thing. 
16 mar 10 guttergawker
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Orange ufo balls of light form triangle over house

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to my cousins house one night and saw one of our local ufo's.  so i decided to stop in a church parking lot to take the video, only this time i had my new high-def camera on me, so i used it.  i dont need to get into details as they ask for since the video explains it.  i have hundreds of these along with some other people.  

1. i was going to town
2. i noticed it cause it was too low to be aircraft and looked awfully familiar as i see these all the time.
3. i didnt think of what it was when i noticed it, i knew what it was-i'm not stupid
4. the object held a steady course, slower than prop plane, and there was also a white ball as i call them that showed up in the same proximity, and time frame as this.  i actually took video of it before returning to take more video of this one.
5. i felt the way i always feel, happy to have one more video
6. lost sight of it since i was in town, and there are houses and trees, and this thing is super low

internet is slow so i'm not going to upload
this is the link to the video, copy and paste please
http://www.Youtube.Com/user/cryinthabluze?Feature=mhw4#p/u/12/dl5a_iw9lu8
content.summary: Ufo over my hometown/video

content.detailedDescription: This was my second sighting of an unidentified craft in the same area.  the first sighting was september 19th.  this time the craft was cylindrical in shape, like a cigarette, with a black vertical stripe in the middle.  it was traveling slowly in the westerly direction, as i was traveling eastbound on schoenersville road in bethlehem.  i noticed the shape coming towards me in the sky as i sat in my car at a red light.  as it came into view i realized that it was not a jet flying at a high altitude, but a substantially smaller craft.  it moved slowly above the building to my left, and my son made a comment about the shape of the craft.  it was a bright silver chrome, and it shone in the sun.  it was a sunny day with a blue sky and no low-lying clouds or fog.  the traffic light changed and i continued driving until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Second sighting of a chrome object in the sky at rush hour

content.detailedDescription:
This is how it went down, i was skywatching as always seeing as ufo's are frequent around here and i happened to notice a light on the ground about half a mile away from me.  now as you watch the videos, i could almost swear this is the white balls that are flying around, as i will donate another hundred reports on those guys.  only difference is it was on the ground doing funny stuff this time, and this isnt the only time i've seen them on the ground around me, just the best video footage i have of the subject at hand.  i am not looney, might use some drugs once in a while but i have very nice cameras that will astound the fools of our planet.  to be honest i dont know why i stopped recording, other than to pull out the telescope but i should have let the camera roll.  through the telescope you see all of what you see here and more, this is fascinating  and i see them alot.  sometimes in the air they will do the same things but its usually a small something that comes in before a bigger craft does.  enjoy!!

1.  where was i?  in my yard
2.  what made me notice it?  i was looking
3.  what did i think?  man i need the camera on this thing
4.  describe the actions?  this object appeared to morph within itself 
                       and continuously change all within a bubble
5.  my feelings, reactions and actions?  i felt really good for having  
                       the opportunity to take this shot, reacted by 
                       grabbing the tripod and camera and proceeded to 
                       take the video you are hopefully gonna watch
6.  how did i lose sight?    you know i really dont remember

now i'm not going to attach the video since my internet isnt the greatest, but those of you smart enough can copy and paste this link to your browser.  the first is the original, the second is the super tweaked version using hsl adjust in sony hd vegas.

http://www.Youtube.Com/user/cryinthabluze?Feature=mhw4

tweaked
http://www.Youtube.Com/user/cryinthabluze?Feature=mhw4#p/u/20/01gz558dht8

i will donate more soon
content.summary: Morphing ufo on the ground/video

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
my name is jeff wong and im from the uk. i had my first pretty close encounter with a triangular ufo.

i had just left junction 17 prestwich/whitefield in manchester to go to preston at approx. 11.50pm  on 16th march 2010.
i looked through my drivers side window towards the purple sky and noticed an unusually bright light, like a torch shining into my direction.    

there was also a smaller light some miles behind it in the near distance, which i can see blipping aircraft lights.  i will explain more about this further down.

i ignored it at first thinking it was a light from a plane  or helicopter.  but as i was near junction 15, i can see that it was a huge perfect triangle shaped object with 3/4's of it lit up with many bright whitish round lights on the underside. not like automobile hid intensity lights, but powerful car fog light type.   in the darker corner, i could see one or two smaller permanent red lights which do not blink.

i thought it was a reflection on my window, until i wound it down, and wow! it was still there!   not that high up in the sky, and it remained totally and perfectly still, in the same place almost right above me!
it was not busy on the motorway, so i quickly pulled up on the hard shoulder and quickly got my camera out.

as soon as i stepped out and pointed it towards the triangular object, it had simply vanished, as if it knew i had noticed it and was going to take pictures.
i remained looking everywhere at the sky, it was quiet and no sign of anything?
the time was approx. 11.52pm or so.

i got into my car and very soon  past the junction 15 sign,  i then  saw the smaller light coming closer towards me, which i mentioned earlier, and indeed, it was a small aircraft flying across my path on the motorway.  it had the usual blipping lights on the plane and   i knew it was an aircraft, but the other one was huge,   definitely  not a plane, stealth fighter, helicopter, 747, police helicopter or toy ufo etc.....

i couldnt say how high it was,  maybe 6 or 7  street lamp posts high?
i do recall when i was driving on the motorway towards it, it was towards my right above eye level.  i  didnt have to lift my head up to see it.

i just felt excited and knew to take note of important details.

i have always been a ufo fan and watched all the ufo hunters series, other ufo related sites and know my aircraft shapes etc..
but i never thought i would witness one myself!


regards

jeff wong
37 years old
content.summary: Huge perfect  triangle, one or two red lights in corner, lots of white lights

content.detailedDescription:
The previous day was very cloudy & couldn't see the ufos , however all afternoon an unmarked blk. helicopter circled back & forth in my area . in the late evening i've checked youtube if toronto's pairanormalguys have posted anything on this event (they have excellent taping gear, you see) , & sure enough there it was on the screen ! since the ufo's fly by regularly , so it seems, i knew somehow they'd be hovering again on mon. march 15/10.
sure enough they were like tiny white stars in the sky. it was barely visible when i zoomed in in search of them. i have taken only 2 photographs as i had to leave in a hurry to run an urgent errant. sky was clear & i took the photos through one of my windows.I slightly edited them for a even better close-up . 
there's more ! on the following clear & very sunny spring like day , tue, march 16 /10 ,(although i sort of sensed the ufos will be back , i took my camera with me , just in case , upon leaving home.  on the way back i could 'feel' they are back yet again , although i could not see it with the naked eye , but at some point in the most bluest sky there was a sm. flash in the sw & so i begun aiming the camera at that part of the sky . took several shots , between the hours : 1:49 pm - 4:45 pm . only few photographs registered very sm. star like lights in the sky. but there were many ! :-)
as usual i'm happy to see them.
content.summary: They're back ! ( a day after the black helicopter circled area )

content.detailedDescription:
at 10:30 indianapolis time, we go outside and look to the east. the only star bright enough to find really easy is the star i'm talking about. ( if it is a star) at 10:30 it's about 20 degrees off the horizon
just to the right of the big dipper handle. when it first comes up it's east to west in line with the big dipper. but, as time goes on it moves in a southwesterly direction not west like everything else.
 there are a thousand stars out there tonight and not one looks like this one.
it  flashes red, white, blue, green, yellow at a fast pace and through the telescope looks like a round black background. does anyone have a clue as to what it is? it's been there every night for several weeks now.
content.summary: Round object with many bright multicolored lights flashing

content.detailedDescription:
at 10:30 indianapolis time, we go outside and look to the east. the only star bright enough to find really easy is the star i'm talking about. ( if it is a star) at 10:30 it's about 20 degrees off the horizon
just to the right of the big dipper handle. when it first comes up it's east to west in line with the big dipper. but, as time goes on it moves in a southwesterly direction not west like everything else.
i've written mufon with no reply. who can i contact that gives a crap enough to answer my e-mail? there are a thousand stars out there tonight and not one looks like this one.
it  flashes red, white, blue, green, yellow at a fast pace and through the telescope looks like a round black background. does anyone have a clue what it is? it's been there every night for several weeks now.
content.summary: Round object with many bright multicolored lights flashing

content.detailedDescription:
On fab 16th 2010 apx around 10:10 - 10:15 pm i was coming back from the store and was walking between the house and next door. it was just flooting across the sky right over my next door neighbors house at apx 15 to 20 mph. 

it was solid black. so black it was like a void in the sky. at apx 500 feet more or less it seemed to move in a stright line no sound at all. i would never have known this thing was above me if i didn't look up. it had 4 dim red lights on each conner on the craft. solid, not blinking. it was moving wast to east. 

no faa lights. 

i don't think i remeber ever seeing a brick flooting in the sky before.

it only had one dimension! not 2 or 3 dimensions just one.. like a flat sheet of black paper it was so flat that it was out of my sight in 30 seconds.. 

i guess cause it was flat and one dimensional. the very dim lights could have been plasma vents to keep it up in the air.. i dunno.. just a guess.

it was a drop jaw moment for me. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. 

i always wanted to see a real ufo for myself all my life. actually after seeing this thing and thinking about it it gives me the willies.

i reported this to the mesquite, texas police dept. nobody else reported this thing and i could tell the cop that called me back was laughing at me for reporting it.. i ask him if anyone else reported this and he said no i was the only one. i reported it like 3 or 4 days later. didn't think the police would do much about it anyways but thought it might help just to document the sighting. this was my "first" ufo sighting. i wish i had a camera handy but the one i do have is only a 4 mega pix camera and seeing the ufo was so dimly lit i don't think it would have been a very good picture or video.
content.summary: Rectagular black craft moving very slow apx 500 feet with 4 dim red lights. no faa lights. 1  dimensional?.. like a flat black sheet of paper with lights on each conner.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was spotted around 8:00 pm, on march 16th.  my wife and i were at 18 mile and hayes, in sterling heights. we witnessed a very bright stationary object southwest of our direction. very low to the ground which is what caught our eyes. ten times as big as a star. we have been ufo believers for years and are always looking at the sky, but until tonight we have never witnessed anything like this. we watched for a few minutes and began to see multiple planes around the object. at one point we seen the object change an array of colors, and it began to move in a western direction.  we got in our car and tried to chase it down.  we drove to 16 mile and clinton river road and saw it again.  the object stopped once more for two or three minutes, just as bright as can be, and very large compared to the planes that were flying around it.  we lost sight of it as it began to glide more west of us rapidly.
content.summary: Large illuminating circular stationary, then moving.

content.detailedDescription:
On the way home from my son's soccer practice we turned south onto our road near boyne city, mi, and in the southeastern sky in front of us, we saw about six or seven yellow circular lights in a row diagonally near the horizon.  they appeared for about five seconds and then disappeared from the ends towards the center until one was left and then it too disappeared.  this happened repeatedly (six or seven times) until about 8:30 which is the last that we saw them.  at times, there were two grouping and sometimes they all faded out at the same time rather than disappearing from the ends inward.  they were not always in the same exact location but did stay in the southeastern sky and were always close to the horizon.  no way of telling for sure, but they appeared to be a couple miles away which would have made their actual size very large.  the lights did not move once they appeared, but would hover in place until their disappearance.  i spoke to a neighbor who has said that he has seen the same thing in the southeastern sky before.  

when i first saw the lights, i thought it must be some new cell-towers that went up.  but the color wasn't right and the position kept moving, so my theory was quickly ruled out.

i was not afraid at the time (my son was).  i stopped my car and got out my phone to take a picture.  i did get a picture, but it was only the last light in the center after the outer lights had disappeared so it just looks like a very, very big star just above the horizon.  

we didn't lose sight of the object.  after a while it just didn't reappear anymore, and we were getting cold, so we went indoors.
content.summary: 5 or 6 hovering yellow lights in a diagonal row close to the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Monday night march 15, 2010 i was sitting in my house in st. louis and happened to look out the window, and saw two bright lights appearing to be underneath a street light across the way. when i locked on to it, it appeared to then "level off" and fly away into the distance in a slight curve around the pole, the lights on when to the right of the pole, off when to the left of it and fading to the distance. it didn't head all the way left as the airplanes do that land at the airport. it especially caught my eye because it looked similar to two white lights i saw in that same direction last june and posted to mufon. these lights were not clearly unconventional, but an hour later, taking in groceries from the car to the house, hovering directly across the cross street were two bright lights that were stationary, with a helicopter flying underneath it. the helicopter could be heard, the "plane" never made a sound. after i looked at it for a few seconds just hovering there and the helicopter moving beneath it, another light appeared to the right and the object started to "glide" away in that direction. a red light then appeared and flashed in a non-discernible pattern. i watched the triangle of white lights with a red light in its middle slowly move away and the helicopter followed it. i could clearly hear the helicopter and no other sound but traffic when it passed close by. ironically, or synchronistically, the june sighting already mentioned also included a triangle that flew over my house a short while after i had seen the object or objects with two white spheres. also, this monday night, my friend at my house and i heard rumbling off and on throughout the evening. after the sighting it got loud enough that we could feel the rumbling indoors and went outdoors to investigate. in the direction that the triangle object was hovering in when i initially saw it, it sounded as if jet engines were rumbling during takeoff when hearing that as an observer close to the ground by an airport when the planes take off. i doubt they were jet engines because the sound would usually build up then suddenly stop as if the engines were literally shut off, but if a plane were making the sound it should have faded away. the lights and sounds monday night were strange. i've included two images i created from pictures i've taken of areas in which i saw the lights from the perspective i saw them, "photoshopping" in the anomalous craft, lights and helicopter.
content.summary: Triangle over st. louis with helicopter following.

content.detailedDescription: My brother were looking at the moon from our front porch--moon was extremly bright-full-very clear--my turn to look through his new birthday present (i think) telescope...Very good for the era..I saw something come from the right side of the moon--like 1/8" off of the moon ( icould see black between the curve of the moon and the object)--it came across to the left--went behind to the dark side but never came out again--of course he never believed me--i havent said much about this for a long time--folks thought i was making up a story--my brother said it probably a bug--it was no bug--i brought this up again a couple of months ago to two of my brothers--they said you bet and we started to laugh...This was before anyone walked on the moon--after sputnik--i kinda thought it was those pesky russians--another failure to the moon maybe...Sam
content.summary: Early 60's-orbit of moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 6:45 pm on february 28, 2010.  i looked up at the sky and saw what appeared to be a shooting star. i quickly pulled out my iphone and started taking pictures.  it became obvious this was not a shooting star as it headed down to the earth.  i thought maybe it was a comet or meteor. it became suspended in the air and there was three individual lights in a triangular shape still heading downward but now it was also moving side to side. a fourth light appeared and finally a fifth light. it looked like a(y).  it was incredible! i had never seen anything like that.  i was still caught up in amazement when i noticed a silent object in the sky moving towards me about a 1/2 mile away from me. this object suddenly released what appeared to be another flash of light which startled me,  and as before this light starts coming down to the earth, splits in two, then three, then four and finally five. it continued moving downward and side to side as if dancing in the sky until i could no longer see them beyond the horizon.  i was totally beside myself. i proceeded to download all my pictures and created a u-tube for all to see.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in redlands florida

content.detailedDescription:
I was born and spent my summers as a youth on the beach in malibu, ca. i am familiar with flight patterns etc...( ie; military bases and lax ) i will attempt to be as short as possible w/ out leaving out detail. 
    i was sitting in my living room which opens unto my deck on the beach (south facing) and have views of the channel islands, and the point of palos verdes as well as lax. it was approximately two thirty a.M. and i was engaged in shall i say, adult activities.
    as i have an inclined sense of awareness, (not to dismiss paranoia) i felt i was being watched. the star like object that i observed as i turned to look out to the ocean, was stationary and the second i looked, it proceeded  to simply move in a horizontal pattern as would the jet liners that are a consistent.
     at first i believed it to be a  military, coast guard or law enforcement  craft. due to the constant invasion of privacy by our local coast guard and sheriff's department, i immediately took video of this craft that seemed to know i was aware of their presence. i believe this because each time i would simulate as if i had dismissed their intrusion, the craft (ufo) would then reverse to its prior position or again become stationary.(at such speed that a human being simply could not stand the g-force and clearly not technology that i am aware of.)
      when i became absolutely livid at the thought of my privacy in my own home being violated after countless occurrences, extra terrestrial, law enforcement or not. i have been documenting these almost nightly episodes. 
       on three apportioned incidents, days if not weeks, i was viewing my "home video's" and observed this multi colored (star like) ; though flat and certainly too close to be a star, send a beam (circular) of light that; judging by my personal video, seemed to have taken at least fifteen minutes to come directly into my living room (lord don't send the twinkie truck when i press send on this) an alien face(s) watched me for the remainder of my video's capacity.  
        my "feelings" on this matter are of no consequence. other than simply being violated as we simple minded americans (forgive my cynicism directed to the powers that be) are assumed to not tell the difference between a weather balloon and a stealth fighter. 
       at any rate, i did not lose sight of these "ufo's" more often than not, they simply travel to a distance and appear to be a star and/or vanish.
       i only write this in hopes it will help in the interest of my country and fellow man regardless of nationality, and hopefully aid in the forge ahead to understand and explore the unknown. god bless you all for your efforts to inform and protect all mankind. thoughtfully, cory...
content.shape: Chevron,   Diamond,   Disc,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: I observe consistent ufo activity from my deck on the beach in malibu and have actually video taped these events.

content.detailedDescription: Feb. 2009 approximately, 10 p m  our security camera recorded a bright light along the west side of our property  moving approximately/from south to north, and appears to beam down perfectly vertical. .The light seen on from the corners of the building/by camera is 200watts and lights that area  for security.The bright light of unknown origin from the sky is tremendously brighter than security,considering it beamed down through trees the entire distance it lit up that drive area.There is also a building electrical line running through the tree limbs from south/southeast to north/northwest above the drive.The trees are approximately 30 feet tall and none of the limbs , or the electric line were seen in light beam.There is an interstate within 1 mile south that you can hear traffic flow if the road is busy, it was not at that time. there are numerous dogs in the local area and they normally bark loudly at any movement. they did not.This area is down in a valley ,two city blocks east there is a hill that rises 200feet.This area is within 5-10 miles of the path of the triangular ufo spotted by numerous local police and reported on the local news  and on t v on a show that was titled ufo over illinois in another ,year previous to this situation.I am familiar with planes, helicopter, balloon/hot air, ultra light air craft. there was no sound from any of these. the camera sound is on loud at all times.You could hear people talking from 20 feet away from camera using a normal speaking voice,if they were speaking.I have no idea what makes a beam of light so bright and straight down,  moving at that slow of speed.Anyone that has seen  the attached video are uncertain also.  all my life i have had interest in the unknown,and have seen ufos in other areas of the country many years ago.
content.summary: Bright beam of light , no sound or noise

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside for a cigarette and was practicing with my new camcorder when i noticed an incredibly bright white/pink light moving across the sky heading in a north east direction. at first it was above my head and i watched for a while as it moved at a steady pace. my mum then joined me outside and also whitnessed the light. it was silent and it was continuously glowing. after a few moments of observing i began to film with my new 70x optical zoom camcorder. you can view the footage here; http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=myafpw6rsdo
content.summary: Bright star like object hovered steadily across the sky

content.detailedDescription: My partner & i were up all night and i went outside 4 a smoke , the time was approx, 3am, not a cloud in the sky and there it hovered ,it was as bright as the moon at least 3 times bigger than any plane. we thought at first that it could be a blimp or balloon but after 45 minutes of not a hint of movement. we still dont know what it was , oh i did tape it on video but i forgot to change the tape and months later i went over it. if anyone knows how to retrieve it i would appreciate it greatly.After hours of going back outside & it hadnt moved i just had enough of not understanding what it was so i never went out again.
content.summary: Bright white, approx 3 x larger than a 747 plane, totally motionless,

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed the stationary lights at around 11:30 pm and they stayed for around two hours. i called people in irvine, ca and laguna beach, ca they also saw the lights in the direction of l.A. from their location. 

i was at my house in victorville, outside and looking towards the mountains.

i thought it might be a satellite, but it the lights were not white.

the object (lights) seemed stationary.
content.summary: Greenish/blue lights in a triangular pattern hovering stationary in the sky in the direction of and over los angeles (southwest of victorville)

content.detailedDescription: Though there may be reports of ufo having been witnessed passing through a solid object i haven't seen any. generally, they are witnessed in the sky or bodies of water.Though the ones i tend to see are in the sky i wonder sometimes if the crafts have limitations. this sighting was of two ufo's that seemed to be avoiding hitting each other as they danced around like fire flys at high speeds, but intentionally avoided crashing into one another. there is, in my mind, a reason for this. see image. this a theroy only.
content.summary: Ufo witnessed in sky but not passing through solid material.
